item.title: Dive into AI Fun: Running DeepSeek-R1 on a Docker Container on Ubuntu
item.description: Dive into local AI! This guide shows you how to easily run the powerful DeepSeek-R1 model on Ubuntu using Ollama and Docker, complete with all the necessary commands for setup and execution.
